ygData.subject: Re: posting
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, please people.  Stop quoting *everything*.  It makes it much harder to enjoy the list when you have to continually wade through a lot of scrolling to
ygData.messageBody:
--- "M.Matecha" <matecha@...> wrote:
> Could we NOT include ALL the past threads in our
> posts? Just the specific part you are answering will
> do. Thanks

Yes, please people. Stop quoting *everything*. It makes it much
harder to enjoy the list when you have to continually wade through a
lot of scrolling to find the responses in each message.

I try not to do "me too" posts, but this one's too important.

We now return you to your regularly scheduled anarchy. Line forms to
the left, unless you're truly in the spirt of anarchy, in which case
you can mingle and mill about where ever you feel like it! :D

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
